io.smudgr.engine

Class Smudge

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.Parametric
      • io.smudgr.engine.Smudge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectItem, Source

    public class Smudge
extends Parametric
implements Source
    TODO: Refactor soon

    The Smudge class is a Parametric Algorithm container. The application instance attempts to render the Smudge at a constant framerate.
